attributes.action: Vote of NO Confidence in current government
attributes.additional_details:
Below are a link to the election promises made by the current government:

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/election-2010/7165000/conservative-manifesto.html

I would like a full debate on this - how many of these policies have been kept to? How many have been ignored? As a UK Citizen and Voter - I would like to know how to table a vote of NO CONFIDENCE in the current government.

Take one significant point to start 'Upholding our own values abroad' - so it's our own values that allow us to give £10bn per year in foreign aid to corrupt governments and those capable of looking after their own people, yet we allow over 4 million UK children live below the poverty line?
